title: Make Developer tools more Front-End Dev Friendly and UI/UX appealing. Use Jsbin strategy
body: The Developer tools at its heart for the new Edge browser seem to continue the same styling thus UI/UX as the old IE browsers.  I think you guys are missing an opportunity here.  As a front end dev I really don't like - let me rephrase that - I despise using IE dev tools because of how poor the UI is.
